text: Ezɨ Elaija kamaghɨn Balɨn akam inigha izir gumazibav gɨa ghaze, “Ia avɨraseme, kamaghɨn amizɨ ia faragh mangɨ, uan bulmakau amɨsevegh a mɨsuegh aneghoregh, a isɨ ofa gamir dakozim darɨgh. Egh avim arɨghan markɨ. Egh ia uan asem ko mɨkɨm an diaghtɨ an avim amadaghtɨ, a izighirɨ ofan kamɨn isi.”
